services.name: Full-Service Wedding Planning
services.description: Comprehensive wedding planning services that cover every detail of your big day, from start to finish.

services.name: Day-Of Coordination
services.description: On-site coordination on the day of your wedding to ensure everything goes according to plan, without a hitch.

services.name: Vendor Management
services.description: Managing all your vendors, ensuring timely delivery of services, and handling any issues that arise.

services.name: Venue Selection
services.description: Assisting you in selecting the perfect venue that matches your vision and budget, handling all the logistics.

services.name: Event Design
services.description: Designing a cohesive and elegant event that reflects your personal style and aesthetic preferences.

services.name: Entertainment
services.description: Providing entertainment options including live music, DJs, and more to keep your guests engaged and entertained.
